summary: A unit‑test suite that validates the behavior of a jitter buffer implementation, checking how it handles ordered and unordered packet insertion, sequence number gaps, discarding of excess packets, buffer resets, removal of audio and video frames, and picture‑loss indication handling.
business_intent: Guarantee robust real‑time audio/video streaming by ensuring the jitter buffer correctly manages packet timing, ordering, and loss recovery, thereby improving playback quality and reducing latency.
